(over phone) Hello, can I speak to Larry?
(into phone) Speaking.

content.text: HALLORAN at telephone booth, phone to ear.

content.line: (into phone) Hello Larry.  This is Dick, Dick Halloran.

content.text: DURKIN, phone to ear, behind counter.

content.line: (into phone) Dick, how are you doing?  How's the weather down there?

content.text: HALLORAN, phone to ear.

content.line: (into phone) I'm not in Florida, Larry.  I'm calling from Stapleton Airport.

content.text: DURKIN, phone to ear, leaning on counter.

content.line: (into phone) What the hell are you doing down there?

content.text: HALLORAN, phone to ear.

content.line: (into phone) Well, I just got in from Miami, and I've got to get up to the Overlook today.  What's the weather like up there?

content.text: DURKIN, phone to ear.

content.line: (into phone) Well, the snow ploughs are keeping things moving in town, but the mountain roads are completely blocked.

content.text: HALLORAN, phone to ear.

content.line: (into phone) That means I'm going to need a snowcat to get up there, Larry. Can you fix me up with one?

content.text: DURKIN, phone to ear.

content.line: (into phone) What's the big deal about getting up there today, especially in this kind of weather?

content.text: HALLORAN, phone to ear.

content.line: (into phone) Larry, just between you and me, we've got a very serious problem with the people who are taking care of the place.  They've turned out to be completely unreliable assholes. Ullman phoned me last night, and I'm supposed to go up there and find out if they have to be replaced.

content.text: DURKIN, phone to ear, looks at his watch.

content.line: (into phone) How long is it going to take you to get up here?

content.text: HALLORAN phone to ear.

content.line: (into phone) Oh about five hours.  I'm gonna rent a car here at the airport.

content.text: DURKIN, phone to ear.

content.line: (into phone) Okay, Dick - I'll take care of it.

content.text: HALLORAN phone to ear.

content.line: (into phone) Oh thanks a lot, Larry.  I really appreciate that.

content.text: DURKIN phone to ear.

content.line: (into phone) That's all right.  Drive carefully.

content.text: He puts phone down.
HALLORAN's car moving forward along snow covered road. CAMERA TRACKS BACK with it.

content.line: Well, good morning to you, Hal and Charlie on Radio 63, KHOW Denver

content.line: and, Charlie, we have what you call your bad day out there.  What you call your heavy snow, snowing hard throughout the eh Denver metro area. Many of the mountain passes - Wolf Creek, and Red Mountain passes are already closed...

content.text: M.S. Shooting from behind HALLORAN through windscreen as he drives along road, passing overturned truck cam.L.

content.line: and the chain law is in effect right now at the Eisenhower Tunnel. I guess as we've just heard from the news forecast, Charlie, a few of the flights are still landing out at Stapleton International Airport, and, with these early storms like this, I guess the entire airport will probably be closed within the hour.  Yeah, they're just not prepared.  The storm will continue throughout the day, and the national weather service... has declared a stopmans and travelers advisory... for all areas outlying the Denver metro region - get the cows in the barn. There you go.  Many businesses...

content.line: Has it ever occurred to you that I have agreed to look after the Overlook Hotel until May the first? Does it matter to you at all that the owners have placed their complete confidence and trust in me, and that I have signed a letter of agreement, a contract, in which I have accepted that responsibility?

content.text: M.S. JACK moves forward L-R.  CAMERA PANS with him.

Why?

L.S. HOTEL.  WENDY at bathroom window.  She draws back into bathroom.
JACK swings axe at splintered panel on door.
JACK pulls piece of wood away from splintered panel, and looks through gap.
M.C.S. JACK at gap in panel.

content.line: Wendy, I'm home.

content.text: He looks down.  CAMERA TILTS DOWN - he removes a piece of wood with hand and then reaches in and unlocks door.
WENDY, back to camera, lifts DANNY up to open window.
WENDY pushes DANNY out through open window onto snow.  She lets him go and he slides L-R down snow.  He stands up at the bottom, and looks up at WENDY at window.
M.S. WENDY struggling to get out of open window.
JACK, carrying axe, moves up stairs from open front door. CAMERA TRACKS BACK with him.
WENDY struggling to get out of bathroom window.  She goes back into bathroom.
M.S. DANNY looking up cam.L at bathroom window.
JACK, carrying axe, walks away across Living Room into Bedroom.  CAMERA TRACKS after him.

content.line: Come out, come out, wherever you are!

content.text: WENDY trying to force window up higher.  She looks over her shoulder, then puts her head down to open window.
WENDY tries to get out of open window.
JACK enters cam.R.  He stops at Bathroom door.  HE RAPS ON
WENDY with head out of open Bathroom window.

content.line: Danny, I can't get out!

content.text: L.S. WENDY at Bathroom window cam.L.  DANNY at foot of slope of snow looking up cam.L.

content.line: Run, run and hide.  Run, quick!

content.text: DANNY runs away L-R.
JACK at Bathroom door.

content.line: Little pigs, little pigs, let me come in!

content.text: WENDY by open window.  She moves L-R to basin.  CAMERA PANS with her.  She picks up knife and moves R-L to side of door.
CAMERA PANS with her.
JACK at Bathroom door.

content.line: Not by the hair on your chiny, chin, chin.  Then I'll huff, and I'll puff

content.text: M.S. JACK holding axe back to camera at Bathroom door.

content.line: and I'll blow your house in.

content.text: He swings axe back.
M.S. JACK swings axe twice at Bathroom door.  WENDY SCREAMS
WENDY standing at side of door.  JACK's axe appear through door.  WENDY SCREAMS.  JACK's axe repeatedly appears and splinters door.  WENDY screams.

content.line: Jack.  Please.  Don't... Don't...

content.text: Head of axe appears through splintered door.  WENDY SCREAMS.

content.line: Don't!  Oh!  Please

content.text: Head of axe appears again through door.  WENDY SCREAMS.

content.line: Stop!

content.text: M.C.S. Splintered door panel.

content.line: Jack!

content.text: JACK in b.g. swings axe at door and smashes away the splintered wood.

content.line: Stop it!  Stop it!

content.text: JACK swings axe at splintered door.

content.line: Stop it!

content.text: JACK moves L-R to gap in splintered door.  WENDY SCREAMS OFF.
JACK's face at gap in splintered door.

content.line: Here's Johnny!

content.text: M.C.S. WENDY holding knife SCREAMS.
M.C.S. JACK's smiling face at gap in splintered door.  He moves backwards and reaches in through gap.
M.C.S. JACK's hand in through gap in door to key on inside of door.
M.S. WENDY strikes down with knife.
M.C.S. JACK's hand on key.  WENDY's knife slashes across back of his hand, and withdraws cam.R.  JACK's hand moves to gap in door.  JACK YELLS OFF.
M.C.S. JACK's face at gap in door.  HE IS YELLING.  He looks down and turns away from door.
Shooting from behind HALLORAN sitting back to camera L.f.g. through windscreen as he drives along snow-covered road.
WENDY at side of door.  She looks cam.R as she hears HALLORAN's Snowcat approaching OFF.
JACK at Bathroom door - he turns round as he hears HALLORAN's Snowcat approaching OFF.  He looks down cam.L.
HALLORAN's Snowcat moves R-L along snow-covered road. CAMERA TRACKS with it revealing Overlook Hotel in b.g.
JACK looking cam.R.  He turns away to splintered door.
WENDY at side of door listening.
HALLORAN's Snowcat moves R-L along front of Hotel.  CAMERA TRACKS with it.  Snowcat stops.

DANNY runs forward along corridor.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK before him.  He runs into kitchen - stops and moves L-R to oven.  He kneels down beside it.  CAMERA PANS with him. DANNY slides oven door open R-L and crawls into it.
M.C.S. DANNY in oven slides door R-L.
M.S. Oven door sliding L-R.
M.S. JACK holding axe limps R-L through kitchen.  CAMERA TRACKS with him.
WENDY sobbing at side of door - then she moves to door and slashes at it with knife.
HALLORAN walking R-L.  CAMERA TRACKS with him.  He moves to door left open by WENDY.  He pulls it open wide and exits into Hotel.
JACK holding axe moves forward - CAMERA PANS R-L and TRACKS with him.  He moves away up stairs.

content.line: Hallo!

content.text: JACK at top of stairs.

content.line: Anybody here?

content.text: JACK moves away from stairs CAMERA TRACKS after him.  JACK moves R-L and looks down at Lobby.  CAMERA TRACKS after him.

content.line: Hallo!  Anybody here?

content.text: M.L.S. HALLORAN moves forward along corridor.  CAMERA TRACKS

content.line: Hallo!

content.text: HALLORAN moves R-L to entrance to Lobby.

content.line: Anybody here?

content.text: HALLORAN moves away into Lobby.  CAMERA TRACKS FORWARD after him.

content.line: Hallo!  Hallo!  Anybody here?

content.text: JACK, holding axe, YELLS as he steps from behind pillar cam.R and moves towards HALLORAN.
M.S. JACK YELLING as he swings axe at HALLORAN.
M.C.S. HALLORAN's chest - axe pierces raincoat and blood oozes out.
M.C.S. DANNY, with his mouth wide open.
M.S. JACK over HALLORAN.  JACK holding onto shaft of axe.
M.C.S. HALLORAN, with his mouth wide open.
M.C.S. DANNY, with his mouth wide open.
M.S. JACK over HALLORAN, holding onto shaft of axe.
M.C.S. HALLORAN, with his mouth wide open, sinks down out of shot.
M.C.S. DANNY, with his mouth wide open.
M.C.S. JACK rises up into shot.
M.L.S. JACK holding axe standing beside body of HALLORAN on floor.  JACK limps forward.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK before him.

content.line: Danny!  Danny boy!

content.text: He stops at corridor to kitchen.

content.line: Danny!

content.text: M.L.S. JACK back to camera in R.f.g.  DANNY climbs out of oven in b.g.  JACK moves forward.  DANNY exits cam.R.f.g. JACK limps away.  CAMERA TRACKS IN after him.

content.line: Danny!  Danny!

content.text: High Angle WENDY runs up stairs L-R.  She pauses on landing.

content.line: Danny!

content.text: CAMERA TRACKS BACK before WENDY as she goes up next flight of stairs.  She stops at top of stairs and looks along landing.
M.L.S. WENDY'S P.O.V.  Shooting along landing into open doorway of bedroom.
MAN, dressed in Dog's costume, kneeling at foot of bed.  He leans back and looks towards her.  MAN, in evening dress, leans forward and looks at WENDY.  CAMERA ZOOMS IN on them.
M.S. WENDY, holding knife, at top of stairs backs away - then turns and runs away along corridor, exiting cam.L at end.
JACK, holding axe, limps forward and moves L-R through entrance.  He walks away to open door.  CAMERA TRACKS after him.  He stops in doorway.
Shooting from door.  HALLORAN's Snowcat in b.g.  CAMERA PANS
JACK, holding axe, at open doorway.  He comes in and moves L-R to switch panel on wall.  He opens cover and presses switches down.  He leans towards open doorway and watches lights going on outside.
DANNY crouched behind track of HALLORAN's Snowcat.  He peers round corner.
JACK limps to open doorway and stops.

content.line: Danny!

content.text: DANNY by track of HALLORAN's Snowcat.  He moves away L-R.
M.L.S. JACK limps away from door.

content.line: Danny!

content.text: M.S. DANNY runs L-R and exits cam.R.
M.S. JACK limping L-R from Hotel.  CAMERA TRACKS with him.

content.line: Danny!

content.text: M.L.S. DANNY running away L-R across snow.  CAMERA PANS with him.  He runs into Maze.
M.S. JACK limping L-R.  CAMERA TRACKS with him.  Hotel in b.g.
DANNY running away through Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS after him. He looks back over his shoulder.
M.S. JACK in the Maze.  He limps forward.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK before him.

content.line: Danny!  I'm coming.  I'm coming Dan!

content.text: He looks down.
M.C.S. DANNY's footprints in snow.  CAMERA TILTS UP & TRACKS FORWARD along DANNY's footprints.
M.C.S. DANNY's feet and legs running away through Maze.
WENDY, carrying knife, runs forward into kitchen.  She looks towards stairs in b.g.

content.line: Danny!

content.text: WENDY stumbles forward through coffee pots and rings on floor.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK before her.

content.line: Oh!

content.text: WENDY turns R-L.  CAMERA TRACKS with her.  She moves away along corridor.  CAMERA TRACKS after her.  She stops at corner.  CAMERA CONTINUES PAST her revealing HALLORAN lying dead on floor of lobby.
M.C.S. WENDY reacts.
M.L.S. HALLORAN's body lying on floor.  CAMERA ZOOMS IN on it.
M.C.S. WENDY looks about.  She moves away R-L.  CAMERA PANS with her.  She SCREAMS and turns to cam.R.  CAMERA WHIP PANS L-R onto M.L.S. INJURED GUEST.
M.S. WENDY reacting - knife trembles in her hand.
M.C.S. INJURED GUEST, with scar running down his head and face.  He raises glass he is holding.

content.line: Great party, isn't it?

content.text: M.S. WENDY SCREAMING turns and runs away.
DANNY running away through Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS after him.

content.line: Danny!  Danny!  I'm coming!

content.text: M.S. JACK limps forward in Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK before him.

content.line: You can't get away.  I'm right behind you.

content.text: WENDY runs forward.

content.line: Danny!

content.text: WENDY runs forward and then moves R-L.  CAMERA PANS with her - she stops cam.R.f.g. and SCREAMS.
M.C.S. WENDY looking about.
M.L.S. SKELETONS sitting in chairs.  Bottle of champagne on table in f.g.
M.S. SKELETONS sitting at table with bottle and glasses on it.
M.L.S. SKELETONS sitting in chairs round tables with bottles on them.
JACK limps away through Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS FORWARD after him.
M.S. DANNY steps backwards in his footprints in snow.
M.S. JACK limps forward laughing.

content.line: Danny!

content.text: M.L.S. DANNY stepping backwards in his footprints in snow. He jumps L-R landing in snow, and crawls L-R - brushing his traces in the snow out with his hands.
WENDY holding knife runs forward.  She slows down as she nears f.g.  She moves R-L.  CAMERA PANS with her to open door.  She stops by doorway and looks along corridor towards lift doors in b.g.
M.S. Lift doors.  Blood gushes in cam.L and surges forward along floor.
M.C.S. WENDY reacts.
M.S. Lift doors.  Blood gushes in cam.L and cam.R - surging forward in wave towards camera.
DANNY sitting leaning against side of Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS R-L revealing JACK, holding axe, cam.R.b.g.  He limps R-L and moves away along Maze.
M.S. DANNY's footprints in the snow - CAMERA TRACKS FORWARD and stops when footprints end.  CAMERA TILTS UP to snow without footprints.
M.C.S. JACK - he looks about then back and forwards - and finally cam.R.

content.line: Danny!

content.text: He looks cam.L.
M.C.S. DANNY crouched against side of Maze.

content.line: Danny!

content.text: M.S. JACK - he looks about then cam.L.

content.line: Danny!

content.text: M.L.S. JACK limps L-R and exits cam.R.
M.S. DANNY appears from behind mound of snow and moves forward R-L.
M.L.S. DANNY's P.O.V.  Empty Maze.
M.S. DANNY moves away R-L from mound of snow.  CAMERA PANS with him.  He runs away along Maze.
M.S. Footprints in snow in Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS FORWARD along footprints.
M.L.S. JACK, back to camera, limping away along Maze. CAMERA TRACKS after him.
M.S. JACK limps forward along Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK before him.
M.S. CAMERA TRACKS FORWARD along Maze.
M.S. DANNY runs forward along Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK.

M.L.S. JACK moves to opening cam.R.  CAMERA TRACKS FORWARD - he turns and moves R-L to opening cam.L.  CAMERA PANS with him.  He stops and turns - then moves L-R.  CAMERA PANS with him and TRACKS after him as he limps along MAZE.
WENDY sobbing and holding knife runs away to HALLORAN's Snowcat in b.g.  CAMERA TRACKS FORWARD after her.  She stops by Snowcat and looks about.
DANNY runs forward in Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK.  DANNY looks over his shoulder and falls down in snow at entrance.
WENDY standing by HALLORAN's Snowcat.  She throws down knife.

content.line: Danny!  Danny!

content.text: She runs forward and out cam.R.f.g.
M.L.S. DANNY lying on snow at entrance to Maze.  He gets up and runs R-L.  CAMERA PANS with him.

content.line: Mommy...
Danny, come here!
Mommy... Mommy...!
Danny!

content.text: DANNY runs R-L into WENDY's arms as she kneels on snow.

content.line: Mommy!
Oh!

content.text: WENDY hugs and kisses DANNY.

content.line: Oh Danny!

content.text: JACK holding axe limps forward - CAMERA TRACKS BACK.

content.line: Danny!  Where...

content.text: WENDY holding DANNY moves R-L to HALLORAN's Snowcat.  CAMERA PANS with them.  WENDY opens door of Snowcat and lifts DANNY up to cab.
JACK GROANING staggers away along Maze - CAMERA TRACKS after him.

content.line: Danny!

content.text: He stumbles and lies in snow.  He struggles up to his feet.
Snowcat with lights on moves R-L in front of Hotel, then turns to cam.R.  JACK SHOUTS INAUDIBLE OFF.
JACK staggers forward.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK - INDISTINCT SHOUTS.  He GROANS as he moves forward R-L.
Snowcat drives away down road.  JACK INAUDIBLE SHOUTS OFF.
JACK staggers forward along Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK -
M.L.S. JACK staggers away along Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS after him.  INDISTINCT MOANS.  He slumps down cam.L against side of Maze.
JACK sitting up to his chest in snow dead.  Snow and icicles on his face.
Entrance to Gold Ballroom - CAMERA TRACKS FORWARD through entrance to photographs on wall.  CAMERA TRACKS IN close on photograph of Guests at Ball.
M.S. Photograph of Guests at Ball.
M.C.S. Photograph of YOUNG MAN in dinner jacket.  CAMERA

content.line: JULY 4th BALL 1921
